Short answers to: World population in 2000

Ukrainians – 9,315,958
 Russians – 14,385,000
 Belorussians – 2,782,000

 Belorussians – 2,782,000

 Germans – 3,258,000
 Azerbaijanis – 1,995,000

World population in 2000

Answer using Ukrainian and English languages.

According to the census data from the year 2000, the total population of Ukraine was 9,315,958 people. The population of Russia was 14,385,000, that of Belarus – 2,782,000, that of Tatars – 2,033,000, that of Germany was 3,258,000, and that of Azerbaijan was 1,995,000.
